Quote: No vehicle or semi-trailer or trailer shall exceed in height 13 ½ feet, including load.

Conflicts/Comments: PAGE 5: A vehicle, including load, may not exceed a height of 15feet, except that avehicle operating between the Fox Weigh Station and Prudhoe Bay on the Daltonand Elliott Highways may have a height, including load, of 17 feet.
PAGE 8: WIDTH: 8 feet,  6 inches (8 feet for manufactured homes)

The liability for damage to any person, vehicle, structure or other property caused by any vehicle having a height,including any load thereon, in excess of 12 feet 6 inches shall be borne by the owner and/or the operator of the vehicle.
